name: Direct Hit
baseMeaning: A dart hitting the bullseye of a target.
tldr: On target! Used for accuracy, goals achieved, or being exactly right.

contextMeanings.meaning: Playing darts or hitting a target.
Achieving a goal or being precisely right.

platformNotes.note: Used for on-point comments and goal achievement.
Common for OKRs, targets, and goals.
Popular in goal and motivation content.
